items.title: Activist Elliott takes a stake in Aspen Technology and pushes back on an offer from Emerson
items.description: Elliott Investment Management has a $1.5 billion stake in Aspen Technology, and the activist disagrees with a tender offer from Emerson Electric.

items.title: These S&P 500 stocks are deeply oversold and may be due for a rebound
items.description: This week's list of most oversold stocks on Wall Street included electric vehicle maker Tesla.

items.title: Buy these top stock picks coming out of earnings, Morgan Stanley says
items.description: Morgan Stanley named its favorite stocks to buy as earnings season winds down.

items.title: Earnings season is winding down, and these S&P 500 companies have hiked their dividends
items.description: Stocks are in a rocky patch, but a few companies are announcing dividend increases â€” and that's great news for income investors.

items.title: State Street, Apollo team up to launch first of its kind private credit ETF
items.description: Wall Street is eager to provide access to private equity and credit to the masses, and ETFs are the obvious wrapper.
